reviewText: This is a 27 minute color propaganda film which was adopted by the US Air Force. It shows some introductory shots of ground forces and explains the necessity of stopping supplies from traversing the Ho Chi Minh Trail. It then continues with footage of an air base in Thailand running F-105s. There are great shots of take offs, refueling, and formation flying. There is also ground attack footage of F-4s and F-100s, plus A-1s and Jolly Greens on rescue duty.
